```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=F, results=F}
changeCellColor <- function(row, col){
  c(
    "function(row, data, num, index){",
    sprintf("  if(index == %d){", row-1),
    sprintf("    $('td:eq(' + %d + ')', row)", col),
    "    .css({'background-color': 'orange'});",
    "  }",
    "}"  
  )
}
```

```{r, message=F, warning=F}
race=Dental_Hygienist$`Dental H` %>% dplyr::count(`Describe Your Race or Ethnicity`) %>% mutate(prop=round(n/nrow(Dental_Hygienist$`Dental H`),4))

ggplot(race, aes(x=`Describe Your Race or Ethnicity`, y=n, fill=`Describe Your Race or Ethnicity`)) +geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat="identity")+
 # ylim(c(0, 0.7))+
  ylab("n")+xlab("")+
  theme(legend.position="")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5, size=8))+
  geom_text(aes(label=race$n), position=position_dodge(width=0.9), vjust=-0.25, size=3)+  # add numbers over bars
  ggtitle("year 2019 ")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size=15))  #center the title

ggplot(race, aes(x=`Describe Your Race or Ethnicity`, y=prop, fill=`Describe Your Race or Ethnicity`)) +geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat="identity")+
 # ylim(c(0, 0.7))+
  ylab("%")+xlab("")+
  theme(legend.position="")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5, size=8))+
  geom_text(aes(label=race$prop*100), position=position_dodge(width=0.9), vjust=-0.25, size=3)+  # add numbers over bars
  ggtitle("year 2019 ")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size=15))  #center the title
```
